alert.note: Alert for Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 07 at 2:57PM MST until January 09 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM MONDAY TO 7 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches in the lower elevations and up to 8 inches Whitebird Grade and the higher terrain. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph for Tuesday afternoon. * WHERE...Camas Prairie, Highway 95 Slate Creek to Riggins, Greer Grade, Grangeville and vicinity, and White Bird Grade. * WHEN...From 4 PM Monday to 7 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be affected.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Lower Hells Canyon, Salmon River Region; Orofino, Grangeville Region
